campos.valor: SELECT (CASE WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARCLIENTES') THEN '0' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARFILIAISLOJAS') THEN '1' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-PDVSYNCCOMPARTILHAMENTOMASTER') THEN '6' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARFILIAISCOMPARTILHAMENTO') THEN '6' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPISCOFINS') THEN '9' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPERFILPADRAO') THEN '3' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARIMPOSTONCMPDV') THEN '8' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARUSUARIOOPERADOR') THEN '4' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-CONSULTARCA') THEN '4' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPROFISSIONAIS') THEN '4' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARICMS') THEN '7' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPRODUTOPDV') THEN '12' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO IN (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') like 'WTA-BUSCARESTOQUE%') THEN '14' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO IN (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') like 'WTA-BUSCARPRECOPRODUTO%') THEN '13' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCAROPERADORAPDV') THEN '15' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-DADOSPAGAMENTO') THEN '16' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPLANOSDEPGTO') THEN '17' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARTIPOSCOBRANCAS') THEN '18' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARSTATUSPEDIDO') THEN '55' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARRAMOATIVIDADE') THEN '58'  WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARGRUPOCAMPANHACLIENTE') THEN '21' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARREGIAOPDV') THEN '100' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPRECOFIXO') THEN '28' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPRECOREGIAO') THEN '13' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPRECOEMBALAGEM') THEN '13' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARDESCONTOEACRESCIMO') THEN '59' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARIMPOSTOREFORMATRIBUTARIA') THEN '101' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARNCMREFORMATRIBUTARIA') THEN '102' WHEN :IDROTASERVICO = (SELECT id FROM pcintegracaorotaservico WHERE replace(UPPER(servico), ' ', '') = 'WTA-BUSCARPRODUTOREFORMATRIBUTARIA') THEN '103' ELSE '0,1,6,9,11,5,4,7,14,18,12,15,8,20,3' END) T FROM DUAL
